info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 25 at 3:11PM PDT until August 25 at 5:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHEASTERN NYE AND WESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 311 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area have decreased. However, Between 1.75 and 2.25 inches of rain has fallen and runoff from the earlier storms is continuing. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pahrump, Wheeler Wash, and Trout Canyon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
